name: Junktion
description:
Gamepad strongly recommended; works a bit better as a download than via web. Fullscreen the web version!

A puzzle platformer created for GMTK Jam 2021 for the theme "Joined Together"! Regrettably we didn't have time to implement everything we wanted on this but it might be fun to revisit! We never made a platformer before! Sorry for all the junk jank and thanks for playing!

Music by Tallbeard Studios/Abstraction.
